Lead supervisor: [Julie Deslippe](https://people.wgtn.ac.nz/julie.deslippe)

Ilya is a PhD student in the School of Biological Sciences at Victoria University of Wellington. He is interested in the role of soil fungi in the functioning of ecosystems and the impact of climate change on these interactions.
